user_query: also in New York that Peter Sohn's parents opened their first grocery store after immigration The fire elements usually live in a region called Firetown, and this place seems to have its motif from Koreatown and Chinatown, where immigrant Koreans and Chinese usually live Elemental's primary pioneering element, the water element, is similar to the white American class that migrated from England to the United States Second, air elements that come to Element City have a lot in common with black Americans because they say they are athletic and second, they come to the city There are many opinions that the Element City Hall was built on the basis of the earth elemental village, and the city hall's bureaucracy appeared as the earth elemental, so it is similar to the American Jewish community Finally, the element that came to Element City is similar to the Asian-American and Hispanic immigrants because they originally lived in their hometown of Fireland and they didn't have much amenities Also, even if you say the same thing, being teased for having a slightly different accent because of the language you used or being wary of by many people because you are strangers is the same discrimination that immigrants had to face The protagonists of Elemental are Ember and Wade, and others include Ember's parents, Bernie and Cinder, and neighbor Clod, and Wade's mother, Brook, and her younger brother, Harold The heroine of Elemental, Ember Lumen, instead of the name AMBER, which is usually
